title: murugA enavE dinam oru muraiyEnum nAm
sahitya:
murugA enavE dinam oru muraiyEnum nAm karudinAl urudiyAi kaDaittEri viDalAmE


anupallavi

  tiruvEragamadu mEvi guruparan enat-tigazh paramEshak-kumarEshanai bhakti paravashattODu


caraNam    cittam nilaiyilE siridum nillAmalE pittu piDittadu pOla kulain-alaindu
mettp-pADu paTTu mEdini mIdinilE tattaLikkAdu uidu nityAnandam eidiDa
